docs.title: 介绍|Introduction
docs.text:
Regivs Bannia

“Everything will be being better”

天体物理学在读|A sophomore studing Astrology

It is profound, deepist, fascinating soul and awarness that inhabit this not eye-catching body of mine which provide the power to think or look things critically, individually and the ability to contemplate beyond external value systems. Unaffected by societal judgments, my strength lies in dialectial reasoning, fostering a unique perspective in my approach to life and learning. 我这个并不引人注目的身体里住着深刻、迷人的灵魂和觉悟，为我提供了批判性地思考的能力和看待事物的独特视角，以及超越外部评价体系的意识思维。我的优势在于辩证推理，不受社会判断的影响，在我的生活和学习中保持了鲜明的个性。

It's very difficult to come up with a screen name that represents myself. Even though I had an English name that I gave myself when I was a child, Afreid Lye. The Regivs Bannia you see on the front page now is my Latin translation of Royal Bunny in English, and this English name is translated from the Chinese "御兔", means the royal rabbit, legend has it that during the reign of ancient Rome, a certain area in today's Croatia was the place where the royal hunted rabbits, so it seems that there is a similar place name on the earth. 很难想出一个代表我自己的网名，尽管我小时候给自己起了一个英文名字，Afreid Lye。你现在在首页看到的Regivs Bannia是我拉丁文翻译的英文Royal Bunny，这个英文名字是从中文“御兔”翻译过来的，意思是皇家的兔子，传说在古罗马统治时期，今天克罗地亚的某个地区是皇家猎兔的地方，所以地球上似乎也有一个类似的地名。

  • Extremely wide hunting and a wide range of knowledge. Wide range of hobbies from traditional Chinese culture to Western ancient and modern cultures
  • Sports: Running + Snooker
  • Astronomy enthusiast: Studying and loving astronomy
  • Traditional culture: be able to play guqin music, love and compose ancient poems, and be familiar with traditional classics
  • Exotic cultures: Latin language. Love world history and is studing Western astrology, alchemy and other occults from a modern academic perspective.
  • Digital enthusiasts: Familiar with the information and use of electronic devices such as computers, customized keyboards,etc
  • Personal vision: pay attention to social and people's livelihood, political economy, and historical development
  • 极其广泛的狩猎和宽广的知识范围。兴趣爱好广泛且独特，对中国传统文化和西方古今文化均有所了解
  • 体育方面：跑步＋斯诺克
  • 天文爱好者：正在学习并且喜爱天文学专业
  • 传统文化：能够演奏古琴曲，爱好并创作古诗词，熟读传统经典
  • 异域文化：拉丁语。喜爱世界历史，并正在从现代学术角度研究古近代西方占星学、炼金术等神秘学
  • 数码爱好者：熟悉计算机、客制化键盘、手机等电子设备的信息和使用
  • 个人视野：关注社会民生、政治经济、历史发展

docs.title: 经历|Past
docs.text: Grown in a beautiful and peaceful place that flowers smile and tree green all year long. Had a wonderful, unforgettable, amazing high school time that I don`t “nay jean”, translated “involution” compared to other high school students in my erea. 我在一个美丽而宁静的地方长大，那里一年四季鲜花盛开，绿树成荫。尤其是我度过了一段美妙、难忘、令人惊叹的高中时光，与我所在地区的其他高中生相比，我从来没有内卷。

docs.title: 计划|Future
docs.text:
It is not for sharing or earning that I build this website. It is only because I still is being a normal humanbeing in the earth that my siprit can`t free from this body or physical form or reality that no other than I need to compete with others to alive to show off myself. So during this process I must be pleasure if this website can help with you or may enlighten you. 我建立这个网站并不是为了赚钱。仅仅是因为我仍然是地球上的一个人，我的灵魂还不能从这个躯体、物质世界或现实中超脱出来，我需要与他人竞争，炫耀自己来生存。因此，在这个过程中，如果这个网站能对您有所帮助或启迪，我一定会很高兴。

  • Astronomy and Astrophysics Popularization
  • Personal interests
  • Various tutorials
  • Customized keyboard IC and GB
  • memorandum
  • *天文学和天体物理学科普
  • 个人兴趣
  • 各种各样的一些教程
  • 客制化键盘IC and GB
  • 备忘录

docs.title: 留意文章
docs.text:
this page use to test phtot

The homomorphism \(f\) is injective if and only if its kernel is only the singleton set \(e_G\), because otherwise \(\exists a,b\in G\) with \(a\neq b\) such that \(f(a)=f(b)\).
